question: how do I reset my password
answer: Go to Settings > Security > Reset Password. You'll receive a confirmation email. Click the link to set a new password.

question: how do I enable two-factor authentication
answer: Go to Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication. Scan the QR code with your authenticator app and enter the verification code.

question: how do I delete my account
answer: Go to Settings > Account > Delete Account. This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data will be removed within 30 days.

question: how do I change my email address
answer: Go to Settings > Profile > Email. Enter your new email and confirm via the verification link sent to both old and new addresses.

question: where can I find my invoices
answer: Go to Billing > Invoice History. You can download PDF invoices for any billing period. Invoices are also emailed on each billing date.

question: how do I update my credit card
answer: Go to Billing > Payment Methods. Click Edit on your current card or Add New to enter a different card. Changes take effect on your next billing cycle.

question: how do I cancel my subscription
answer: Go to Billing > Subscription > Cancel Plan. Your access continues until the end of the current billing period. You can reactivate anytime.

question: can I get a refund
answer: Refunds are available within 14 days of purchase. Contact support with your order number and we'll process it within 3-5 business days.

question: how do I get started
answer: Create an account, complete the onboarding wizard, and follow the quickstart guide in the dashboard. You'll be up and running in under 5 minutes.

question: where do I find my API key
answer: Go to Settings > API > Keys. Click Generate New Key. Copy it immediately â€” it won't be shown again. Use it in the Authorization header of your API requests.

question: what integrations are available
answer: We integrate with Slack, Jira, GitHub, Salesforce, Zendesk, and Zapier. Go to Settings > Integrations to connect your tools.

question: what are the usage limits
answer: Free plan: 1,000 requests/month. Pro plan: 50,000 requests/month. Enterprise: unlimited. Check Billing > Usage for your current consumption.

question: how do I track my order
answer: Go to Orders > Your Order > Track Shipment. You'll see real-time tracking with estimated delivery date. A tracking link is also emailed when your order ships.

question: how long does shipping take
answer: Standard shipping: 5-7 business days. Express: 2-3 business days. Overnight: next business day. International orders may take 7-14 business days.

question: do you ship internationally
answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by destination. Customs duties may apply.

question: what is your return policy
answer: You can return items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. Items must be unused and in original packaging. Contact support to initiate a return.

question: can I exchange an item
answer: Yes. Initiate a return and place a new order for the replacement item. We'll refund the original once we receive it back.

question: I received a damaged item
answer: Contact support with photos of the damage and your order number. We'll send a replacement at no cost and arrange pickup of the damaged item.

question: I'm getting a 500 error
answer: A 500 error indicates a server-side issue. Try again in a few minutes. If it persists, check our status page or contact support with the error details.

question: the app is running slow
answer: Try clearing your browser cache, disabling extensions, or switching browsers. If the issue persists, check our status page for any ongoing incidents.

question: I can't log in
answer: Check that caps lock is off and you're using the correct email. Try resetting your password. If you use SSO, contact your IT admin. Clear browser cookies if the issue persists.

question: how do I contact support
answer: Email support@example.com, use the in-app chat widget, or call 1-800-EXAMPLE during business hours (Mon-Fri 9am-6pm EST).

question: what are your business hours
answer: Our support team is available Monday through Friday, 9am to 6pm EST. The in-app chat and email support are monitored 24/7.

question: what is your privacy policy
answer: We take privacy seriously. We don't sell your data. Read our full privacy policy at example.com/privacy. We comply with GDPR and CCPA.
